Text: Monuments is a compilation album by the German power metal band Edguy, released on 14 July 2017.

--------------------
Text: Monuments (Edguy album):  The album was released as a two-CD/DVD package including 22 old songs, five new songs, and a previously unreleased song from the original "Savage Poetry" recordings back in 1995.
Triplets:<Monuments
3:
Text: Monuments (Edguy album):  Frontman Tobias Sammet wrote two of the new songs on his own, while guitarists Jens Ludwig, Dirk Sauer and bassist Tobias Exxel co-wrote each of the other three.
